title: Roman Villa and Medieval Settlement at Piazza Armerina
description: The so-called "Villa Romana del Casale" (of Roman date) and the nearby settlement of Piazza Armerina, which seems to have been occupied by survivors from the villa site after it was destroyed in an earthquake in the early middle ages. The villa is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in part because of its famous mosaics.

properties.description: Representative point for the center of the excavated archaeological area, derived through analysis of Google Earth imagery. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: Imagery location
